mapper.sql: report_id,report_no, user_id, project_id, word_template_id, insure_type, insure_code, insurer, insurer_name, insure_deadline, insure_amount, deductible, accident_time, accident_place, accident_cause, accident_pass, liability_affirm, reported_loss_amount, verify_loss_amount, adjustment_amount, surveyor, certificate_code, foreword_content, object_description, survey_time, survey_place, survey_case, insurer_representative, survey_surveyor, claimant_description, danger_time, danger_place, damaged_object, danger_case, iorder_liability, verify_loss_gist, verify_loss_process, repeat_insure, third_liability, deductible_salvage, loss_adjustment, surveyor_conclusion, report_file, remark, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT a.report_id, a.report_no, a.user_id, a.project_id, a.word_template_id, a.insure_type, a.insure_code, a.insurer, a.insurer_name, a.insure_deadline, a.insure_amount, a.deductible, a.accident_time, a.accident_place, a.accident_cause, a.accident_pass, a.liability_affirm, a.reported_loss_amount, a.verify_loss_amount, a.adjustment_amount, a.surveyor, a.certificate_code, a.foreword_content, a.object_description, a.survey_time, a.survey_place, a.survey_case, a.insurer_representative, a.survey_surveyor, a.claimant_description, a.danger_time, a.danger_place, a.damaged_object, a.danger_case, a.iorder_liability, a.verify_loss_gist, a.verify_loss_process, a.repeat_insure, a.third_liability, a.deductible_salvage, a.loss_adjustment, a.surveyor_conclusion, a.report_file, a.remark, a.create_time, b.project_name, c.address as insurer_address, c.link_man as ins_link_man, c.link_phone as ins_link_phone, d.`name` as sur_name, d.mobile as sur_phone, d.tel as sur_tel, e.name as client_name, e.address as client_address, e.link_man as client_link_man, e.link_phone as client_link_phone FROM report a LEFT JOIN project b ON a.project_id = b.project_id LEFT JOIN customer c on a.insurer=c.customer_id LEFT JOIN user d on a.surveyor=d.user_id LEFT JOIN customer e on a.client_id=e.customer_id where report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
